Author: Horev
Title: [ANN][ICO] CrazyBET - Bet on any events with you friends. ICO July 23 - Aug 10
Body: Exactly. You can bet on any event with other CBET players or only with your friends (bet by password). But not only sport events. We are concentrated on wide range of bets.   The platform allows you to create three types of bets: Bet with a third party confirmation by Arbiter without automatic confirmation).  Bet with automatic confirmation by API (weather, sports events). Bet on the competition in games with PvP mode (Starcraft, Call of Duty etc).   Examples of bets third party confirmation (your Arbiter or CBET Arbiter): Who will drink more alcohol? Who is the first to go on a date with Mary? Who will reach faster to a certain point? Who is the first to pick up a girl at a bar? Who will be promoted this month? Who has it bigger?)   Example of bets with automatic confirmation  Weather You can make a bet with a friend or any person on a series of weather events: What will be the maximum temperature in the city X on August 12, 2017? The maximum temperature in city A will be more than in city B. Will there be rain this weekend in Alaska? What height or what speed will the waves reach in Soorts-Hossegor?  Cryptocurrency cost Work on the API occurs with several exchanges, so with a bet you need to choose one, the results of which will determine the choice. It is enough to choose the terms of the dispute, for example: Will the BTC price achieve a certain rate? What amount of turnover will be on a BTC/ETH pair on Poloniex? What is the size of the largest transaction from 08 to 09 PM on the Bittrex exchange for a BTC/LTC pair? How many times will Apple be mentioned in the NY Times articles for July 15, 2017?  And you can play one on one or a wall to the wall (in PvP mode) with a prize fund. StarCraft, WarCraft, World of Tanks, Call of Duty, Counter Strike and other games where there is a PvP mode.

Author: Horev
Title: [ANN][ICO] CrazyBET - Bet on any events with you friends. ICO July 23 - Aug 10
Body: CrazyBET (crazybet.io)   Our mission is to allow friends to easily bet with each other on any events.   Links: www.crazybet.io ▐  WHITE PAPER  ▐  ROADMAP   Bet with a third party confirmation https://ico.crazybet.io/third_ico.jpg Bet with automatic confirmation by API https://ico.crazybet.io/api_ico.jpg Bet on the competition in games with PvP mode https://ico.crazybet.io/pvp.jpg  Russian topic https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2031523 Spanish topic https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2035192 Indonesian topic https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2029613 Turkish topic https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2029815 French topic https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2036677 Hindi topic https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2038423 Italian topic https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2043509   Examples of bets: Who will drink more alcohol? Who is the first to go on a date with Mary? Who has it bigger?) What  turnover will be on a BTC/ETH pair on Poloniex? Who is better in StarCraft? Will the BTC price achieve a certain rate? What height or what speed will the waves reach in Soorts-Hossegor?   CBET platform allows you to create three types of bets: Bet with a third party confirmation. Bet with automatic confirmation by API. Bet on the competition in games with PvP mode.  Our platform will act as guarantor of such transactions and providing extensive options for their organization. The internal currency for betting is CBET.  It works on the basis of smart contracts, which allows them to achieve a high level of security and honesty of bets.   Using our website or app, people will be able to customize all the details of the dispute and conclude it. The platform provides security from scammers and waiver of bid through smart contracts, automation of decision making and competent work with Arbitrators.  ICO  START DATE: July 23, 2017 at UTC 00:00 END DATE: August 10, 2017 at UTC 00:00  ICO price - 2000 CBET = 1 ETH. The domestic currency of the platform is the CBET. After project starts (October 2017) CBET price for players, if buy at the platform will be 1CBET=0,5$. It's more than 5 times more expensive than when buying at ICO.    Site: www.crazybet.io White paper: https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B_cpdOXraSuXWmdkSVRrenZCLTQ Slack invite: https://join.slack.com/t/icocbet/shared_invite/MjE0OTI3NzQwOTgyLTE1MDAzMzc4NDAtZGRkZjA1OWU3ZA   Bounties CrazyBET   Official bounty topic: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2030149.0  For your attention: - daily facebook and daily signature campaign - translates and articles in fixed amount of coins   Total tokens for Bounties is 1 200 000 (more than 100 000$ for now and about 500 000$ after project starts).  Bounties categories:  Translation and moderation – 200 000 CBET tokens Twitter – 200 000 CBET tokens Facebook – 150 000 CBET tokens Article/Blog/media – 250 000 CBET tokens Signature – 250 000 CBET tokens Other – 150 000 CBET tokens  Translation & Moderation Total CBET available for the translation bounty: 200 000 tokens.  Translation must be of a high quality (not using google translate).   You will receive additional CBET for each post you get in the thread of your translation. Translators must also be able to manage their local communities and answer questions in translated ANN thread till the end of ICO.   Translation (fixed CBET amount): Website = 1500 CBET tokens (about 150$). White Paper = 3000 CBET tokens (about 300$) Bitcointalk ANN (with new thread in Local community) = 1000 CBET (about 100$) and 10 CBET (about 1$) for every post in the thread.   Fill form for participate: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScGKHNI7zAbrXD9e66TPF1sqfbqWPYb_45ki1dTiB-IJ27TXw/viewform?usp=sf_link List: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1QlR54tpekoUIpnXP5kkPAEmUa9_Kf1jiI4BFWoCTMcc/edit?usp=sharing  Required Translations:   Chinese: French : German: Polish: Romanian: Italian: Japanese: Spanish: Portuguese other    Twitter Follow & Repost campaign  Total CBET available for the Twitter campaign: 200 000 tokens.  Bounty will be divided among the participants proportionally to the amount of their stakes. Follow us on Twitter: 20 stakes per week  Every retweet, quote tweet or mention: - 10 stakes for 100-300 followers - 20 stakes for under 1000 followers - 50 stakes for 1000 or more followers  Terms: There should be a minimum of 80% real followers. The account must be at least 3 months old. The number of your followers is being fixed at the moment when you connect your account and doesn’t change during the campaign. Don't delete any retweet until the end of the Campaign  Our twitter https://twitter.com/CrazyBETio Registered: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdj0WoXm9KKw27cEIzj_NtWCGc_C9d5Qu3zagVFJ7kk6DHGPw/viewform?usp=sf_link List of accepted participants: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1QlR54tpekoUIpnXP5kkPAEmUa9_Kf1jiI4BFWoCTMcc/edit?usp=sharing  Facebook campaign  Total CBET available for the Facebook campaign: 200 000 tokens.  Bounty will be divided among the participants proportionally to the amount of their stakes.  For Daily stakes you must meet all conditions of LCP (Like, Comment, Repost) in one day by UTC time. LCP conditions: 1) “Like” 1 post (text / image / video) 2) Minimum 1 Comment (at least 30 characters per comment) 3) Public share of any 1 post  Each LCP will earn you the following amount of stakes: 29 and less - 1 stake From 30 to 99 friends - 10 stakes From 100 to 249 friends - 20 stakes From 250 to 999 friends - 60 stakes From 1000 to 9999 friends & followers - 150 stakes 10000 friends & followers and more - 250 stakes  Terms: The account must be at least 3 months old. The number of your followers is being fixed at the moment when you connect your account and doesn’t change during the campaign. Fake, dead, inactive and bot accounts will not be accepted. Joining with multiple accounts is not allowed. Don't delete any share or comments until the end of the Campaign  Our FB page https://www.facebook.com/Crazybet-1443365965730664/ Registered: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSffVut7bYXYqz5GarcEAq40-cBDN-4_ECJLwYALT9ZrkP0dPQ/viewform?usp=sf_link List of accepted participants: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1QlR54tpekoUIpnXP5kkPAEmUa9_Kf1jiI4BFWoCTMcc/edit?usp=sharing  ARTICLE BOUNTIES  Total CBET available for the Article/Blog/media: 200 000 tokens.  Write an article about CreazyBET on your blog or site or on Medium or other popular platform and you will receive stakes depending on the size of the article and the number of readers. Every submission will be rated individually. No stakes, only fixed CBET amount. For example: Article 300-400 words on blog with 1000 visitors it’s about 1000 CBET (100$).  Terms: Don’t spam! The language is not important. Articles must contain a minimum of 700 characters or more without spaces Article must contain at least 2 links on crazybet.io All articles written must be only unique content and correct grammar. Articles must also be accessible by any member of the public.  Once an article is written please submit it to : horevadim@gmail.com or PM.   OTHER BOUNTIES   Total CBET available for the Article/Blog/media: 150 000 tokens.  You can write an article about CrazyBET in any media relevant to finances and cryptocurrency. You can start thread on other forums. You can submit our ICO on any ICO lists. You can help us to improve our bounties  If you have an idea, contact us at ja.kotans@gmail.com  Signature campaign  Total CBET available for the Signature campaign: 250 000 tokens.  Bounty will be divided among the participants proportionally to the amount of their stakes.  Jr Member and Member: 5 Stakes daily Full Member: 10 Stakes daily Sr Member: 20 Stakes daily Hero and Legendary: 40 Stakes daily  Terms for recieve daily stakes: Put the code and keep it in the signature not less than a week. Write 1 quality post daily in the main topics of the company. Write minimum 1 post daily in any other topics on the forum.  Main topic:  Main topic: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2027177.0 Registered: https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLScowewZtC1UGtBAMYtSB6ccTYjVy_an2BLXSsKUrGZVJ8sYZg/viewform?usp=sf_link List of accepted participants: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1QlR54tpekoUIpnXP5kkPAEmUa9_Kf1jiI4BFWoCTMcc/edit?usp=sharing Daily update.   Jr. Member:  Code: [center] [url=https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2027177.0]Bet on any events! ICO stat at July 23[/url] [url=crazybet.io]SITE[/url] ▬▬ [url=https://twitter.com/CrazyBETio]TWITTER[/url][/center]  Member:  Code: [center] [url=http://www.crazybet.io/] Bet on PvP game, bet with arbiter, bet on weather or any event. ICO start at July 23. [/url]   [url=https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2027177.0]GENERAL TOPIC[/url] ▬▬ [url=https://www.facebook.com/Crazybet-1443365965730664/]FACEBOOK[/url] ▬▬ [url=https://twitter.com/CrazyBETio]TWITTER[/url][/center]  Full member, Senior member, Hero/Legendary member: Code: [center][b][url=http://crazybet.io/][font=arial][color=#205FA7]WHO WILL DRINK MORE ALCOHOL? ▐  [font=arial black][color=#10B2FF]CrazyBET - BET ON ANY EVENT[/color][/font] ▐  WHO IS THE FIRST TO PICK UP A GIRL AT A BAR?[/url] [url=https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2027177.0]GENERAL TOPIC[/url] ▬▬ [url=https://www.facebook.com/Crazybet-1443365965730664/]FACEBOOK[/url] ▬▬ [url=https://twitter.com/CrazyBETio]TWITTER[/url][/B][/center]  PM me for any questions.

Author: Horev
Title: [ANN][ICO] CrazyBET - Bet on any events with you friends. ICO July 23 - Aug 10
Body: We know this great project since last year.  But they are concentrated on Â«blockchain gamesÂ» around block hash string: The player inputs a certain amount of tokens to guess the last digit of hash code string in a certain future block. The player inputs a certain amount of tokens to guess whether the last digit of hash code string in a certain future block is big or small.  But no any external API with weather sites, cryptocurrency exchange or PvP game servers. And have not Â«ArbiterÂ» at the system. And we are the web-oriented system.  We are from one market but different business.    Quote from: l10no on July 17, 2017, 06:11:47 PM Betting project again, this is nice hopefully the reward for this project is very big. Is there a plan for bounty campaign or is there airdrop for this? I really excited for betting project Bounty campaign updated in start topic. You are welcome!
